11:31 <vmassol1> Enygma`: good morning, you have http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7739 assigned for 6.2. You're still doing it?

11:32 <vmassol> same question for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10296  
11:32 <vmassol> and http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6540  
11:35 <Enygma`> vmassol: hm. Now that I`m finishing with the release I can start handling them  
11:37 <vmassol> hmm maybe for 6.3M1  
11:38 <vmassol> unless they're critical bug fixes  
11:38 <Enygma`> I have no problem with that

15:13 <gdelhumeau> cjd: please :)  
15:14 <gdelhumeau> cjd: about targetQueryString and icon of course  
15:14 <cjd> +\* \*\*targetQueryString\*\* : the query string to add to the URL for the \*\*target\*\* document.

17:18 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
17:26 <vmassol1> tmortagne: the fact that the version is 1.1 is not going to cause a problem when the blog app is now at 6.2RC1?  
17:26 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
17:28 <tmortagne> EM UI might talk about "downgrade" but EM does not really care in practice, it means that you can't have both at the same time and it will replace the standard blog when you install this extension  
17:29 <tmortagne> hmm there might be one issue in main wiki with XE extension actually  
17:29 <tmortagne> since XE extension indicate it require a blog in version 6.2RC1  
17:30 <tmortagne> but not putting the feature means you will end up with both extensions marked installed at the same time  
17:31 <tmortagne> we really need a default distribution with less extensions...  
17:32 <tmortagne> it's ok for subwikis since they don't have blog extension by default
